input_text:
Job Title: Test Automation Engineer Lead/Analyst- Atlanta

Location: Atlanta, GA

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Analyst, Information Technology, Strategy/Planning

Description:
This role will require 4 days in office at our Dunwoody, GA facility. No relocation assistance is available for this role. Local applicants are highly preferred. No Sponsorship is available for this position.Who We Are: Park Place Technologies is a global data center and networking optimization firm. Powered by the world’s largest on-the-ground engineering team, a robust group of advanced engineers and our fully staffed, 24x7x365 Enterprise Operations Center, we offer a robust portfolio of IT solutions to optimize networking and data center Uptime and performance. As the industry leader, our 2500 Park Place Associates provide support to 21,000+ customers in more than 154+ countries. We are proud to service 90% of Fortune 500 companies and 40% of Forbes 100 clients. Our company’s strength and success are a credit to our Associates, and Park Place Life is how we communicate and deliver our culture internally. We have been awarded as a NorthCoast 99 “Best Workplace” winner for 10 consecutive years in recognition of our employee commitment. Park Place Life is about collaboration, responsiveness, diversity, and integrity, and represents everything that makes our company great and our culture unique.Top Rated Benefits We Offer: We cover 100% of your Healthcare benefits!Flexible Vacation to promote work-life balance.12 weeks of Paid Maternity LeaveAnnual Profit Sharing401K matching contributions and earnings are always 100% vested.Plus, much more!!!Position Overview: We are seeking a highly motivated Lead QA Automation Test Engineer to join our growing QA team. In this role, you will work closely with QA automation test engineers, software engineers, business analysts, and key business stakeholders to ensure the quality of our cloud-based software, microservices and integrations between systems.What you’ll be doing:Provide guidance, mentorship and training to our QA test engineering teamDefine automation best practices and architecture for testing cloud-based software, proprietary microservices and integrations to 3rd party products, including microservices and integrations between systemsDevelop and write test plans for automation projects, ensuring they align with project requirements and timelinesCoordinate test automation architecture designs between projects where there are integrations in place or being developed.Ensure all automation test suites are executed as required and report test results in a timely and accurate mannerAnalyze and report test results, identifying areas of improvement and working with cross-functional teams to implement changesStay up-to-date with the latest software testing trends and technologiesCollaborate with software engineers, business analysts, and key stakeholders to ensure project requirements are met and test coverage is comprehensive, including for cloud-based software, microservices, and integrations between systemsContinuously evaluate and improve the company's testing processes, methodologies, and toolsCollaborate with software engineers and architects to incorporate automated test runs with project builds where appropriateWhat we’re looking for:Minimum of 5 + years of experience in software test automation, with at least 2 years in a leadership roleStrong understanding of software development methodologies, testing methodologies, and software testing toolsExperience in designing and executing automation test scripts for web-based applications, APIs, and integrations between systems, including microservices and cloud-based softwareExperience with a variety of automation tools: The ability to work with a range of automation tools such as Selenium, Appium, JMeter, TestComplete, and other commercial and open-source testing toolsFamiliarity with testing frameworks: Knowledge of popular testing frameworks such as TestNG, JUnit, and NUnitExcellent leadership and communication skillsAbility to manage multiple projects simultaneously and meet deadlinesStrong analytical and problem-solving skillsBonus Points: Agile experience a plusExperience with coding automated tests in C#Experience with automating testing of mobile applications including on emulators and simulatorsEducation: Bachelor of Science in Software Engineering or equivalent work experienceTravel: Up to 10%If you are a qualified individual with a disability or a disabled veteran, you may request a reasonable accommodation if you are unable or limited in your ability to access job openings or apply for a job on this site as a result of your disability. You can request reasonable accommodations by calling 1-877-778-8707.Park Place Technologies is an Equal Opportunity Employer M/F/D/V.Park Place Technologies has an in-house recruiting team that focuses exclusively on the hiring needs of our company. We are not currently accepting additional third-party agreements or unsolicited resumes. If you would like to be considered as a preferred partner with Park Place Technologies, please submit your detailed information to careers@parkplacetech.com. Any CVs submitted directly to hiring managers will be considered unsolicited and become the property of Park Place Technologies.

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level

preferred_degrees: Bachelor of Science in Software Engineering
job_responsibilities: Provide guidance and mentorship to QA test engineering team
Define automation best practices and architecture
Write test plans for automation projects
Ensure execution of automation test suites
Stay updated with software testing trends and technologies

output_json.equal_opportunity_policy: Park Place Technologies is an Equal Opportunity Employer M/F/D/V.

other.content: Park Place Technologies is a global data center and networking optimization firm. Powered by the world’s largest on-the-ground engineering team, a robust group of advanced engineers and our fully staffed, 24x7x365 Enterprise Operations Center, we offer a robust portfolio of IT solutions to optimize networking and data center Uptime and performance.

We cover 100% of your Healthcare benefits! Flexible Vacation to promote work-life balance. 12 weeks of Paid Maternity Leave Annual Profit Sharing 401K matching contributions and earnings are always 100% vested. Plus, much more!!!
Park Place Technologies is an Equal Opportunity Employer M/F/D/V.
